en-US.summary: This simple skill reads the calendar events for the UC Berkeley D-Lab.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask berkeley d-lab what's going on today
Alexa ask berkeley d-lab what's going on tomorrow
en-US.name: Berkeley D-Lab
en-US.description: This simple skill reads the calendar events for the UC Berkeley D-Lab. The default reads out the events for the current day, otherwise a different date can be specified.
